instruction: Create a chart detailing the pros and cons of renting a house versus buying a house.
output:
|Renting|Buying|
|-------|------|
|Pros|Pros|
|Flexibility|Property ownership|
|No maintenance costs|Possible financial appreciation|
|No commitment to a location|More control over property|
|Cons|Cons|
|No financial appreciation|More financial commitment|
|No control over property|Higher maintenance costs|
|No tax advantages|Less flexibility|
